content:
I did some changes for damage to balance the game more.
I edited the climbing so I made that you climb as long as there's energy, but energy will start increasing after one second of not climbing.
title: Devlog Notes

content:
Some new features:
- Link notes with tasks (optional)
- Link timers to tasks (optional)
- A lot of new thngs in task list (move tasks, sart timers, add/view linekd notes)
- More useability improvements
title: Notes for task:
